p: A total of 20 g of dry lavender florets at different developmental stages were collected, and the essential oil of the lavender was extracted by water distillation followed by soaking in distilled water for 1 h. All of the isolated essential oil samples were dried over anhydrous sodium sulphate and stored at 4 °C prior to analysis by GC-MS. GC-MS analysis was performed on an Agilent 7890A GC system and an Agilent Technologies 5975C Inert XL Mass Selective Detector, equipped with an HP-5MS UI column (30 m × 0.25 mm × 0.25 μm; Agilent Technologies).
